title: H.O.T.B.O.D.S. and Levar
description: By day, they’re swingin’ sexy aerobics instructors at a Santa Monica health club called H.O.T.B.O.D.S. But, unknown to the public, H.O.T.B.O.D.S. is a CIA code name for the Headquarters of the Bureau of Organized Defense Security. This elite force of female intelligence agents and their chauffeur Levar defend America from the forces of evil.
altHero: three hot women crime fighters with their bodyguard Levar
alt1: three women in unitards walk through a gym
alt2: a woman in a steam room talks to a high-tech device
alt4: three women in a high-tech office give a man at a desk a thumbs up
